zym.tensorflow.classifyfurnishing

Class HardwareClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • zym.tensorflow.general.Classifier
      • zym.tensorflow.classifyfurnishing.HardwareClassifier

  • public class HardwareClassifier
extends Classifier
    Notice: Don't run it as it is because modelDir and libs are hardcoded here 注意: 不要直接运行因为modelDir和libs是编码在源文件里的 classifies 8 categories of hardware:
    carpet,wall-cloth,leather,wood,wall-paper, paint, brick, tile     分类8类硬装贴图：墙纸、墙布、皮革、木头、地毯、墙砖、地砖、涂料 
    0|||b-carpet
1|||b-wall-cloth
2|||l-leather
3|||m-wood
4|||p-wall-paper
5|||t-paint
6|||z-brick
7|||z-tile

    • Constructor Detail

      • HardwareClassifier

        public HardwareClassifier(java.lang.String[] inputPaths)
        classifies 8 categories of hardware:
        carpet,wall-cloth,leather,wood,wall-paper, paint, brick, tile         分类8类硬装贴图：墙纸、墙布、皮革、木头、地毯、墙砖、地砖、涂料
        Parameters:
        inputPaths - paths to all inputs. if first element of this array is a dir, the result file is saved there; if not, the result file is saved alongside with this file 如果该数组的第一个元素是文件夹， 结果列表储存在该文件夹中，否则储存在第一个文件所在的文件夹中
